review: This is the greatest device since ice cream. Just plug it in, set it up and start watching streaming video.Works great and easy to set up.
author: Bob

review: Can't really complain given the cost of the device.  However I do wish the device had more uses other than casting Netflix or youtube.  It did a barely satisfactory job at casting a browser page with flash content, the sound kept playing in the chrome browser and there was a lag between the video and the sound.I've had this for over a month and like my title indicated it was cool for a few days, now its just connected to the TV.Hope Google will start releasing updates to make this more useful.
